attributes.action: Introduce extra lessons in secondary schools, possibly junior schools which shows the dangers of alcohol, drugs and tobacco.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I believe  that extra lessons should be introduced in the National Curriculum which shows the dangers of alcohol, drugs and tobacco, many children these days get a taste of alcohol etc while hanging about on the streets, especially vodka and not relising they took too much and then end up in hospital, and also they get into criminal activities because they are so hooked on drugs and regret it.

rejection.details:
This petition has several in existence already:
http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/nokidssmoking/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
